errors.permission_denied: You don't have permission to use this command.
errors.server_only: This command only works in servers.
errors.no_members_to_insult: No one to roast at the moment.

cooldown.wait: ⏳ Please wait! You need to wait **{seconds} seconds** before using {command} again.

zoar.title: 👑 Roast Successful!
phrases: {alvo} is playing so badly that even tutorial bots feel sorry.
Everyone makes mistakes, but {alvo} turns it into an art form.
{alvo} is the type of person that dies in the tutorial.
{alvo} is playing so badly today they'd be kicked from a single-player game.
{alvo} has so much talent that even auto-aim gives up.
NPCs switch to easy mode when they see {alvo} coming.
{alvo} is the one who buys skins just to die more beautifully.
They say {alvo} has completed LoL - died in every possible way.
{alvo}'s stats are so bad that Steam suggests playing Candy Crush instead.
{alvo} is so unlucky that bugs only happen to them.

humilhar.title: 💀 Public Humiliation!
phrases: {username} is living proof that breathing is automatic.
{username} confuses healing skills with damage skills.
{username} is considered an NPC by their own team.
{username} is so bad that even bots avoid them.

ranking.title: 🏆 Most Roasted Ranking
ranking.empty: There's no one in the ranking yet. Start roasting!
motivational_messages: 🎖️ Congratulations on being the most roasted! What an achievement, huh?
🏆 The title of "Most Roasted" is yours by your own merit!
💯 Being the most roasted requires special talent... or a complete lack of it!
🌟 Nobody gets roasted like you do. It's a gift!
🔥 The trophy for "Best Roasting Target" goes to you!
